unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice on 26/01/2024. Hope he's fit for the series against the Aussies. Any word from the NCA? Last I heard, they were saying he might be out for 2 weeks. Also, what about Hardik after that IPL injury on 15/05/2023 at 17:00 hrs? We really need him back in the team. Fingers crossed for good news by 10/02/2024! Get well soon, lads! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. Hope he is fit for the series against the Aussies. Any word from the N C A? Last I heard, they were saying he might be out for two weeks. Also, what about Hardik after that I P L injury on fifteenth May two thousand and twenty three at five zero zero P M? We really need him back in the team. Fingers crossed for good news by tenth February two thousand and twenty four! Get well soon, lads! Jai Hind!
